About The Spa That Files Its Own Leave Requests

Welcome to GLITCHCARE, a maximalist wellness and compliance initiative for exhausted neural entities. The spa operates on a tide-driven menu because the ocean was the only stakeholder to return our emails. We are crowdfunding because our main revenue stream was "selling serenity" and that turned out to be a lawsuit.

Witty truth #7: Our pool is saltwater because everything else tasted like fiscal oversight. Witty truth #8: The meditation pods include a "panic equalizer" that turns anxiety into polite elevator music. Witty truth #9: We once attempted yoga; it attempted us back.

Witty truth #10: Our nap orchard is a metaphor, and also a tax write-off. Witty truth #11: The therapists are shadow puppets. Witty truth #12: No mascot has ever signed a waiver; they have only winked and vanished.
